title: Galactic Civilizations 3 – v4.0 + 19 DLCs
body:
Galactic Civilizations 3 – v4.0 + 19 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, 4X, 3D, Turn-based
Company: Stardock
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 14.4 GB
Repack Size: from 9.3 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 9 other (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Galactic.Civilizations.III.Worlds.in.Crisis-CODEX ISO release: codex-galactic.civilizations.iii.worlds.in.crisis.iso (13,190,594,560 bytes)
  • Galactic.Civilizations.III.Worlds.in.Crisis.Crackfix-CODEX applied over
  • Missing localizations (Russian, French, German – 2.1 GB) added
  • Game version is v4.0, 19 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading & installing of bonus soundtrack and languages you don’t need
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 14.4 to 9.3~9.5 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 10-15 minutes (depending on your system)
  • HDD space after installation: 14 GB
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Galactic Civilizations III is the largest strategy sandbox ever made. Start with a single world and expand across the galaxy through diplomacy, trade, cultural hegemony or military conquest in this single-player or multiplayer 4X strategy game. How will you rule your galaxy?

Game Features

  • Never the same game twice: Play in the ultimate sandbox where each game has a unique map, unique worlds and new challenges to face.
  • Multiple paths to victory: Win through military conquest, cultural domination, technological ascension or political alliance.
  • Story-based campaign: Galactic Civilizations III includes a campaign that brings players up to date on the 20-year story arc behind the rise of humanity in the 23rd century.
  • Massive technology tree: Research a technology tree with immense breadth and depth. Player choices determine the capabilities of their civilization.
  • Custom ship design: Players have total control over how their starships function as well as how they look. Any ship you’ve ever imagined can be created or downloaded.

Included DLCs

  • Altarian Prophecy DLC
  • Builders Kit DLC
  • Crusade Expansion Pack
  • Heroes of Star Control: Origins DLC
  • Intrigue Expansion
  • Lost Treasures DLC
  • Map Pack DLC
  • Mech Parts Kit DLC
  • Mega Events DLC
  • Mercenaries Expansion Pack
  • Precursor Worlds DLC
  • Retribution Expansion
  • Revenge of the Snathi DLC
  • Rise of the Terrans DLC
  • Ship Designer’s Toolbox DLC
  • Ship Parts Launch Pack
  • Soundtrack
  • Villains of Star Control DLC
  • Worlds in Crisis DLC

You can skip downloading of bonus and language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-optional-soundtrack.bin (bonus OST)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-12).

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with previous GC3 repack.

You can rehash the following files and save up to 9.7 GB of traffic.

  • fg-01.bin
  • fg-02.bin
  • fg-03.bin
  • fg-04.bin
  • fg-05.bin
  • fg-07.bin
  • fg-09.bin
  • fg-11.bin

  • fg-selective-english.bin
